summary.span: Converts a base data type to another base data type.

span.span: Converts a base data type to another base data type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 靜態方法類別主要用來在.NET Framework 支援的基底資料型別來回轉換。The static methods of the class are primarily used to support conversion to and from the base data types in the .NET Framework. 支援的基底類型為， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，，和。The supported base types are , , , , , , , , , , , , , and . 此外，類別包含方法，以支援其他類型的轉換。In addition, the class includes methods to support other kinds of conversions. 本主題包含下列章節：This topic consists of the following sections: [基底型別轉換](#Base) [Conversions to and from Base Types](#Base) [非十進位數字](#NonDecimal) [Non-Decimal Numbers](#NonDecimal) [從自訂物件轉換為基底類型](#Custom) [Conversions from Custom Objects to Base Types](#Custom) [特定文化特性格式資訊](#Culture) [Culture-Specific Formatting Information](#Culture) [Base64 編碼方式](#Base64) [Base64 Encoding](#Base64) [其他常見的轉換Other Common Conversions](#Other) ## 基底型別轉換Conversions to and from Base Types 轉換方法可用來將每個基底型別轉換成每個其他基底型別。A conversion method exists to convert every base type to every other base type. 不過，實際的呼叫，以特定的轉換方法可以產生一個 5 的結果，在執行階段的基底類型和目標基底類型的值而定。However, the actual call to a particular conversion method can produce one of five outcomes, depending on the value of the base type at run time and the target base type. 這五種結果是：These five outcomes are: - 不是轉換。No conversion. 嘗試從類型轉換至其本身時，發生這種的情況 (例如，藉由呼叫類型的引數與)。This occurs when an attempt is made to convert from a type to itself (for example, by calling with an argument of type ). 在此情況下，此方法只會傳回原始類型的執行個體。In this case, the method simply returns an instance of the original type. - 。An . 這發生在不支援特定的轉換。This occurs when a particular conversion is not supported. 擲回下列轉換：An is thrown for the following conversions: - 從不至， ， ， ，或。Conversions from to , , , , or . - 從不， ， ， ，或至。Conversions from , , , , or to . - 從不以外的任何其他類型至。Conversions from to any other type except . - 從任何其他類型的轉換除外至。Conversions from any other type, except , to . - 。A . 會發生這種情況時嘗試將字串值轉換成任何其他基底型別會失敗，因為字串不正確的格式。This occurs when the attempt to convert a string value to any other base type fails because the string is not in the proper format. 進行下列轉換擲回例外狀況：The exception is thrown for the following conversions: - 要轉換成字串值不等於或。A string to be converted to a value does not equal or . - 要轉換成字串值包含多個字元。A string to be converted to a value consists of multiple characters. - 將字串轉換成任何數值類型無法辨識為有效的數字。A string to be converted to any numeric type is not recognized as a valid number. - 要轉換成字串無法辨識為有效的日期和時間值。A string to be converted to a is not recognized as a valid date and time value. - 轉換成功。A successful conversion. 針對先前的結果中未列出的兩個不同的基底類型之間轉換，所有的擴展轉換，以及所有不會導致資料遺失的縮小轉換將會成功，則方法會傳回目標的基底類型的值。For conversions between two different base types not listed in the previous outcomes, all widening conversions as well as all narrowing conversions that do not result in a loss of data will succeed and the method will return a value of the targeted base type. - 。An . 會發生這種情況是當縮小轉換導致遺失的資料。This occurs when a narrowing conversion results in a loss of data. 例如，嘗試將轉換其值為 10000 的執行個體來類型會擲回因為 10000 的範圍之外資料型別。For example, trying to convert a instance whose value is 10000 to a type throws an because 10000 is outside the range of the data type. 如果數值類型的轉換導致遺失有效位數 （也就是說，某些最小有效位數遺失），將不會擲回例外狀況。An exception will not be thrown if the conversion of a numeric type results in a loss of precision (that is, the loss of some least significant digits). 不過，如果結果大於可以表示為特定的轉換方法的傳回值類型，例外狀況就會擲回。However, an exception will be thrown if the result is larger than can be represented by the particular conversion method's return value type. 例如，當轉換成，可能會發生遺失有效位數，但是在擲回任何例外狀況。For example, when a is converted to a , a loss of precision might occur but no exception is thrown. 不過，如果幅度太大，而無法表示，會發生溢位例外狀況。However, if the magnitude of the is too large to be represented by a , an overflow exception is thrown. ## 非十進位數字Non-Decimal Numbers 類別包含靜態方法，讓您可以將整數值轉換為非十進位字串表示法、 呼叫和轉換字串為整數值，代表非十進位數字。The class includes static methods that you can call to convert integral values to non-decimal string representations, and to convert strings that represent non-decimal numbers to integral values. 每一種轉換方法包括`base`可讓您指定數字系統，則為二進位 (基底 2)、 八進位 (基底 8) 和十六進位 (基底 16)，以及十進位 (基底 10) 的引數。Each of these conversion methods includes a `base` argument that lets you specify the number system; binary (base 2), octal (base 8), and hexadecimal (base 16), as well as decimal (base 10). 還有一組方法，將每個符合 CLS 標準的基本整數類資料類型轉換成字串，並將字串轉換成每個基本的整數類資料類型的其中一個：There is a set of methods to convert each of the CLS-compliant primitive integral types to a string, and one to convert a string to each of the primitive integral types: - 和，若要將位元組值與指定的基底中的字串。 and , to convert a byte value to and from a string in a specified base. - 和，若要將 16 位元帶正負號的整數，與指定的基底中的字串。 and , to convert a 16-bit signed integer to and from a string in a specified base. - 和，若要將 32 位元帶正負號的整數，與指定的基底中的字串。 and , to convert a 32-bit signed integer to and from a string in a specified base. - 和，若要將 64 位元帶正負號的整數，與指定的基底中的字串。 and , to convert a 64-bit signed integer to and from a string in a specified base. - 若要將指定之格式的位元組值的字串表示轉換成帶正負號的位元組。, to convert the string representation of a byte value in a specified format to a signed byte. - 若要將使用指定的格式為整數的字串表示轉換成不帶正負號的 16 位元整數。, to convert the string representation of an integer in a specified format to an unsigned 16-bit integer. - 若要將使用指定的格式為整數的字串表示轉換成不帶正負號的 32 位元整數。, to convert the string representation of an integer in a specified format to an unsigned 32-bit integer. - 若要將使用指定的格式為整數的字串表示轉換成不帶正負號的 64 位元整數。, to convert the string representation of an integer in a specified format to an unsigned 64-bit integer. 下列範例會將值轉換字串在所有支援的數值的格式。The following example converts the value of to a string in all supported numeric formats. 接著，它會將轉換的字串值回值。It then converts the string value back to a value. [!code-cpp[System.Convert#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert/CPP/NonDecimal1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Convert#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert/CS/NonDecimal1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Convert#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert/VB/NonDecimal1.vb#2)] ## 從自訂物件轉換為基底類型Conversions from Custom Objects to Base Types 除了支援基底類型之間轉換方法支援的任何自訂類型轉換成任何基底型別。In addition to supporting conversions between the base types, the method supports conversion of any custom type to any base type. 若要這樣做，請自訂型別必須實作介面，定義方法實作的型別轉換成每個基底型別。To do this, the custom type must implement the interface, which defines methods for converting the implementing type to each of the base types. 不支援的特定類型的轉換應該擲回。Conversions that are not supported by a particular type should throw an . 當傳遞給方法的自訂型別做為其第一個參數，或當`Convert.To`*類型*方法 (例如或呼叫並傳遞其第一個為自訂類型的執行個體參數，方法又呼叫自訂型別實作，以執行轉換。When the method is passed a custom type as its first parameter, or when the `Convert.To`*Type* method (such as or is called and passed an instance of a custom type as its first parameter, the method, in turn, calls the custom type's implementation to perform the conversion. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[.NET Framework 中的型別轉換](~/docs/standard/base-types/type-conversion.md)。For more information, see [Type Conversion in the .NET Framework](~/docs/standard/base-types/type-conversion.md). ## 特定文化特性格式資訊Culture-Specific Formatting Information 所有基底型別轉換方法和方法包含的型別參數的多載。All the base type conversion methods and the method include overloads that have a parameter of type . 例如，方法有下列兩個多載：For example, the method has the following two overloads: - - 參數可以提供特定文化特性格式資訊來協助轉換程序。The parameter can supply culture-specific formatting information to assist the conversion process. 不過，它會忽略大部分的基底型別轉換方法。However, it is ignored by most of the base type conversion methods. 它僅供下列基底型別轉換方法。如果`null`引數傳遞給這些方法，使用代表目前執行緒文化特性的物件。It is used only by the following base type conversion methods.If a `null` argument is passed to these methods, the object that represents the current thread culture is used. - 將值轉換成數值類型的方法。By methods that convert a value to a numeric type. 參數由型別參數的多載用和。The parameter is used by the overload that has parameters of type and . 它也會使用的型別參數的多載和物件的執行階段類型是否。It is also used by the overload that has parameters of type and if the object's run-time type is a . - 將值轉換成日期和時間的方法。By methods that convert a value to a date and time. 參數由型別參數的多載用和。The parameter is used by the overload that has parameters of type and . 它也會使用的型別參數的多載和物件的執行階段類型是否。It is also used by the overload that has parameters of type and if the object's run-time type is a . - 由包含的多載參數，將數字值轉換為字串或值到一個字串。By the overloads that include an parameter and that convert either a numeric value to a string or a value to a string. 不過，任何使用者定義型別實作可以進行使用參數。However, any user-defined type that implements can make use of the parameter. ## Base64 編碼方式Base64 Encoding Base64 編碼方式將二進位資料轉換為字串。Base64 encoding converts binary data to a string. 為 base-64 位數表示的資料可以輕鬆地傳達只能傳輸 7 位元的資料通道上。Data expressed as base-64 digits can be easily conveyed over data channels that can only transmit 7-bit characters. 類別包含下列方法，以支援 base64 編碼方式： 位元組陣列的轉換方法支援一組或遷入及遷出組成 base 64 數字字元的 Unicode 字元陣列。The class includes the following methods to support base64 encoding: A set of methods support converting an array of bytes to and from a or to and from an array of Unicode characters consisting of base-64 digit characters. - 可將位元組陣列轉換成 base64 編碼的字串。, which converts a byte array to a base64-encoded string. - 可將位元組陣列轉換成 base64 編碼的字元陣列。, which converts a byte array to a base64-encoded character array. - 可將為 base64 編碼字串轉換成位元組陣列。, which converts a base64-encoded string to a byte array. - 可將 base64 編碼的字元陣列轉換成位元組陣列。, which converts a base64-encoded character array to a byte array. ## 其他常見的轉換Other Common Conversions 您可以使用其他類別 NET Framework 中執行不支援靜態方法的某些轉換類別。You can use other classes in the NET Framework to perform some conversions that are not supported by the static methods of the class. 它們包括：These include: 轉換為位元組陣列Conversion to byte arrays 類別提供方法，將轉換的基本數值類型 (包括) 至位元組陣列，而且從位元組陣列回復為基本資料型別。The class provides methods that convert the primitive numeric types (including ) to byte arrays and from byte arrays back to primitive data types. 字元編碼和解碼Character encoding and decoding 類別和其衍生的類別 (例如和) 提供方法來編碼字元陣列或字串 (也就是將它們轉換成位元組陣列中特定的編碼方式) 和解碼編碼的位元組陣列 （亦即，將位元組陣列轉換回 UTF16 編碼的 Unicode 字元。The class and its derived classes (such as and ) provide methods to encode a character array or a string (that is, to convert them to a byte array in a particular encoding) and to decode an encoded byte array (that is, convert a byte array back to UTF16-encoded Unicode characters. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[.NET Framework 中的字元編碼方式](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-encoding.md)For more information, see [Character Encoding in the .NET Framework](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-encoding.md) ## Examples 下列範例會示範部分中的轉換方法類別，包括， ，和。The following example demonstrates some of the conversion methods in the class, including , , and . [!code-cpp[System.Convert#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert/CPP/converter.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Convert#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert/CS/converter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Convert#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert/VB/converter.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一般用途的轉換方法，將所指定的物件轉換`value`至`conversionType`。 is a general-purpose conversion method that converts the object specified by `value` to `conversionType`. `value`參數可以是任何類型的物件和`conversionType`也可以是物件，代表任何基底或自訂型別。The `value` parameter can be an object of any type, and `conversionType` can also be a object that represents any base or custom type. 轉換成功，`value`必須實作介面，因為方法只會包裝對適當的呼叫方法。For the conversion to succeed, `value` must implement the interface, because the method simply wraps a call to an appropriate method. 此方法需要該轉換`value`至`conversionType`支援。The method requires that conversion of `value` to `conversionType` be supported. 這個方法會使用目前執行緒的文化特性來進行轉換。This method uses the current thread's culture for the conversion. ## Examples 在下列程式碼中，說明了如何使用 方法。The following example illustrates the use of the method. [!code-cpp[convertchangetype#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/convertchangetype/CPP/convertchangetype.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[convertchangetype#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/convertchangetype/CS/convertchangetype.cs#1)] [!code-vb[convertchangetype#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/convertchangetype/VB/convertchangetype.vb#1)]

span.para: 方法可以轉換為其他類型的列舉值。不過，它無法轉換另一種類型的列舉值，即使來源類型是列舉型別的基礎型別。若要轉換為列舉值的類型，使用轉型運算子 （C# 中） 或 （在 Visual Basic) 的轉換函式。下列範例說明轉換，來回大陸列舉值。 [！ code-csharp[System.Convert.ChangeType#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.changetype/cs/changetype_enum2.cs#5)][！ code-vb[System.Convert.ChangeType#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.changetype/vb/changetype_enum2.vb#5)] 方法可以轉換為其他類型的 null 的型別。不過，它無法將另一個類型轉換值為 null 的型別，即使的基礎類型。若要執行轉換，您可以使用轉型運算子 （C# 中） 或 （在 Visual Basic) 的轉換函式。下列範例說明可為 null 的型別進行來回轉換。 [！ code-csharp[System.Convert.ChangeType#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.changetype/cs/changetype_nullable.cs#7)][！ code-vb[System.Convert.ChangeType#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.changetype/vb/changetype_nullable.vb#7)]

The method can convert an enumeration value to another type. However, it cannot convert another type to an enumeration value, even if the source type is the underlying type of the enumeration. To convert a type to an enumeration value, use a casting operator (in C#) or a conversion function (in Visual Basic). The following example illustrates the conversion to and from a Continent enumeration value. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.ChangeType#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.changetype/cs/changetype_enum2.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.ChangeType#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.changetype/vb/changetype_enum2.vb#5)] The method can convert a nullable type to another type. However, it cannot convert another type to a value of a nullable type, even if is the underlying type of the .To perform the conversion, you can use a casting operator (in C#) or a conversion function (in Visual Basic). The following example illustrates the conversion to and from a nullable type. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.ChangeType#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.changetype/cs/changetype_nullable.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.ChangeType#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.changetype/vb/changetype_nullable.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一般用途的轉換方法，將所指定的物件轉換`value`到預先定義的類型所指定`typeCode`。 is a general-purpose conversion method that converts the object specified by `value` to a predefined type specified by `typeCode`. `value`參數可以是任何類型的物件。The `value` parameter can be an object of any type. 轉換成功，`value`必須實作介面，因為方法只會包裝對適當的呼叫方法。For the conversion to succeed, `value` must implement the interface, because the method simply wraps a call to an appropriate method. 方法也會需要該轉換`value`至`typeCode`受到支援。The method also requires that conversion of `value` to `typeCode` be supported. 方法不支援的轉換`value`至自訂類型。The method does not support the conversion of `value` to a custom type. 若要執行這類轉換，請呼叫方法。To perform such a conversion, call the method. ## Examples 下列範例說明如何使用方法，以變更所指定的型別參數，如果可能的話。The following example illustrates how to use the method to change an to the type specified by the parameter, if possible. [!code-cpp[System.Convert.ChangeType#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.changetype/cpp/changetype_01.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Convert.ChangeType#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.changetype/cs/changetype01.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.ChangeType#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.changetype/vb/changetype01.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一般用途的轉換方法，將所指定的物件轉換`value`至`conversionType`。 is a general-purpose conversion method that converts the object specified by `value` to `conversionType`. `value`參數可以是任何類型的物件和`conversionType`也可以是物件，代表任何基底或自訂型別。The `value` parameter can be an object of any type, and `conversionType` can also be a object that represents any base or custom type. 轉換成功，`value`必須實作介面，因為方法只會包裝對適當的呼叫方法。For the conversion to succeed, `value` must implement the interface, because the method simply wraps a call to an appropriate method. 此方法需要該轉換`value`至`conversionType`支援。The method requires that conversion of `value` to `conversionType` be supported. `provider`參數是實作，提供轉換的格式設定資訊。The `provider` parameter is an implementation that supplies formatting information for the conversion. 是否以及如何使用這個參數會相依於基礎實作。Whether and how this parameter is used depends on the underlying implementation. 如果`value`是基底資料型別，`provider`只適用於下列轉換：If `value` is a base data type, `provider` is used only for the following conversions: - 轉換的數字為字串，或從一個數字的字串。Conversion from a number to a string, or from a string to a number. `provider` 必須是物件物件或自訂傳回實作物件。`provider` must be a object, a object, or a custom implementation that returns a object. 不過，因為方法會執行預設"G"格式規範，轉換`provider`參數如果有任何作用`value`或目標類型是不帶正負號的整數。However, because the method performs the conversion using the default "G" format specifier, the `provider` parameter has no effect if `value` or the target type is an unsigned integer. 如果`provider`是`null`、使用代表目前執行緒文化特性的物件。If `provider` is `null`, the object that represents the current thread culture is used. - 從轉換為字串，或從字串到值值。Conversion from a value to a string, or from a string to a value. `provider` 必須是或物件。`provider` must be a or object. 如果`provider`是`null`、使用代表目前執行緒文化特性的物件。If `provider` is `null`, the object that represents the current thread culture is used. 如果`value`是應用程式定義的型別，其實作可能會使用`provider`參數。If `value` is an application-defined type, its implementation may use the `provider` parameter. ## Examples 下列範例定義一個實作 `Temperature` 介面的 類別。The following example defines a `Temperature` class that implements the interface. The method can convert an enumeration value to another type. However, it cannot convert another type to an enumeration value, even if the source type is the underlying type of the enumeration. To convert a type to an enumeration value, use a casting operator (in C#) or a conversion function (in Visual Basic). The following example illustrates the conversion to and from a Continent enumeration value. However, it cannot convert another type to a value of a nullable type, even if is the underlying type of the . To perform the conversion, you can use a casting operator (in C#) or a conversion function (in Visual Basic). The following example illustrates the conversion to and from a nullable type. remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一般用途的轉換方法，將所指定的物件轉換`value`到預先定義的類型所指定`typeCode`。 is a general-purpose conversion method that converts the object specified by `value` to a predefined type specified by `typeCode`. `value`參數可以是任何類型的物件。The `value` parameter can be an object of any type. 轉換成功，`value`必須實作介面，因為方法只會包裝對適當的呼叫方法。For the conversion to succeed, `value` must implement the interface, because the method simply wraps a call to an appropriate method. 方法也會需要該轉換`value`至`typeCode`受到支援。The method also requires that conversion of `value` to `typeCode` be supported. 方法不支援的轉換`value`至自訂類型。The method does not support the conversion of `value` to a custom type. 若要執行這類轉換，請呼叫方法。To perform such a conversion, call the method. `provider`參數是實作，提供轉換的格式設定資訊。The `provider` parameter is an implementation that supplies formatting information for the conversion. 是否以及如何使用這個參數會相依於基礎實作。Whether and how this parameter is used depends on the underlying implementation. 如果`value`是基底資料型別，`provider`只適用於下列轉換。If `value` is a base data type, `provider` is used only for the following conversions. 如果`null`引數傳遞給這些方法，使用代表目前執行緒文化特性的物件。If a `null` argument is passed to these methods, the object that represents the current thread culture is used. - 轉換的數字為字串，或從一個數字的字串。Conversion from a number to a string, or from a string to a number. `provider` 必須是物件物件或自訂傳回實作物件。`provider` must be a object, a object, or a custom implementation that returns a object. 不過，因為方法會執行預設"G"格式規範，轉換`provider`參數如果有任何作用`value`或目標類型是不帶正負號的整數。However, because the method performs the conversion using the default "G" format specifier, the `provider` parameter has no effect if `value` or the target type is an unsigned integer. - 從轉換為字串，或從字串到值值。Conversion from a value to a string, or from a string to a value. `provider` 必須是或物件。`provider` must be a or object. 如果`value`是應用程式定義的型別，其實作可能會使用`provider`參數。If `value` is an application-defined type, its implementation may use the `provider` parameter. ## Examples 下列範例定義名為的自訂格式提供者`InterceptProvider`，指出當其方法呼叫，並傳回FR-FR 文化特性和EN-US 文化特性的物件。The following example defines a custom format provider named `InterceptProvider` that indicates when its method is called and returns a for the fr-FR culture and a object for the en-US culture. 使用此格式提供者中的所有呼叫方法。This format provider is used in all calls to the method. 這個範例會建立與陣列和值，並會重複的呼叫與每個值的每個成員列舉型別。The example then creates an array with a and a value and makes repeated calls to with each value and each member of the enumeration. 此範例說明當此方法會使用參數也會說明如何使用和`provider`參數以執行區分文化特性的格式。The example illustrates when the method uses the parameter and also illustrates the use of the `provider` parameter to perform culture-sensitive formatting. remarks.format: ## Remarks `inArray` 為 base 64 數字、 空格字元和尾端填補字元所組成。`inArray` is composed of base-64 digits, white-space characters, and trailing padding characters. 以遞增順序，從零 base 64 數字是否為大寫字元"A"到"Z"、 小寫字元"a"到"z"、"0"到"9"的數字和符號"+"和"/"。The base-64 digits in ascending order from zero are the uppercase characters "A" to "Z", lowercase characters "a" to "z", numerals "0" to "9", and the symbols "+" and "/". 空白字元，及其 Unicode 名稱和十六進位的字碼指標，都使用定位字元 （字元表格，U + 0009），新行換行字元 （U + 000A）、 歸位字元 （歸位字元、 U + 000d） 和空白 （空格、 U + 0020）。The white-space characters, and their Unicode names and hexadecimal code points, are tab (CHARACTER TABULATION, U+0009), newline (LINE FEED, U+000A), carriage return (CARRIAGE RETURN, U+000D), and blank (SPACE, U+0020). 任意數目的空格字元可出現在`inArray`因為所有的空格字元會被忽略。An arbitrary number of white-space characters can appear in `inArray` because all white-space characters are ignored. 用處的字元，"="做為尾端填補。The valueless character, "=", is used for trailing padding. 結尾`inArray`可以包含零個、 一個或兩個填補字元。The end of `inArray` can consist of zero, one, or two padding characters. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法設計來處理單一字元陣列，其中包含要解碼的所有資料。The method is designed to process a single character array that contains all the data to be decoded. 若要解碼資料流的 base-64 字元資料，使用類別。To decode base-64 character data from a stream, use the class. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法來解碼 uuencode 編碼 (base-64) 的資料，並將它儲存為二進位輸出。The following example demonstrates the use of the method to decode UUencoded (base-64) data and save it as binary output. [!code-cpp[System.Convert UUEncodeDecode functions#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Convert UUEncodeDecode functions/CPP/class1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Convert UUEncodeDecode functions#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Convert UUEncodeDecode functions/CS/class1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Convert UUEncodeDecode functions#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Convert UUEncodeDecode functions/VB/class1.vb#3)] 下列範例會示範和方法。The following example demonstrates the and methods. 輸入會分成三個位元組 （24 位元） 每個群組。The input is divided into groups of three bytes (24 bits) each. 因此，每個群組包含四個每個數字，範圍從十進位的 0 到 63 的 6 位元數字。Consequently, each group consists of four 6-bit numbers where each number ranges from decimal 0 to 63. 在此範例中，有具有一個位元組其餘 85 3 位元組的群組。In this example, there are 85 3-byte groups with one byte remaining. 第一個群組包含 00，01、 02 產生四個十進位的 0、 0、 4 和 2 相等的 6 位元值的十六進位值。The first group consists of the hexadecimal values 00, 01, and 02, which yield four 6-bit values equal to decimal 0, 0, 4, and 2. 這些四個值對應至"base 64 數字、 A"、"A"、"E"和"C"，輸出的開頭。Those four values correspond to the base-64 digits, "A", "A", "E", and "C", at the beginning of the output. 整數數字 3 位元組的群組不存在，如果剩餘的位元組會有效地以零填補來形成完整的群組。If an integral number of 3-byte groups does not exist, the remaining bytes are effectively padded with zeros to form a complete group. 在此範例中，最後一個位元組的值為十六進位 FF。In this example, the value of the last byte is hexadecimal FF. 前 6 個位元等於十進位 63，對應為 base 64 數字"/"結尾的輸出，而接下來的 2 位元填補零，以產生十進位 48，對應至 base 64 數字，"w"。The first 6 bits are equal to decimal 63, which corresponds to the base-64 digit "/" at the end of the output, and the next 2 bits are padded with zeros to yield decimal 48, which corresponds to the base-64 digit, "w". 最後兩個的 6 位元值會填補，並對應至用處填補字元，"="。The last two 6-bit values are padding and correspond to the valueless padding character, "=". [!code-cpp[convert.tobase64chararray#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/convert.tobase64chararray/CPP/tb64ca.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[convert.tobase64chararray#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/convert.tobase64chararray/CS/tb64ca.cs#1)] [!code-vb[convert.tobase64chararray#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/convert.tobase64chararray/VB/tb64ca.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `s` 為 base 64 數字、 空格字元和尾端填補字元所組成。`s` is composed of base-64 digits, white-space characters, and trailing padding characters. 以遞增順序，從零 base 64 數字是否為大寫字元"A"到"Z"、 小寫字元"a"到"z"、"0"到"9"的數字和符號"+"和"/"。The base-64 digits in ascending order from zero are the uppercase characters "A" to "Z", lowercase characters "a" to "z", numerals "0" to "9", and the symbols "+" and "/". 空白字元，及其 Unicode 名稱和十六進位的字碼指標，都使用定位字元 （字元表格，U + 0009），新行換行字元 （U + 000A）、 歸位字元 （歸位字元、 U + 000d） 和空白 （空格、 U + 0020）。The white-space characters, and their Unicode names and hexadecimal code points, are tab (CHARACTER TABULATION, U+0009), newline (LINE FEED, U+000A), carriage return (CARRIAGE RETURN, U+000D), and blank (SPACE, U+0020). 任意數目的空格字元可出現在`s`因為所有的空格字元會被忽略。An arbitrary number of white-space characters can appear in `s` because all white-space characters are ignored. 用處的字元，"="做為尾端填補。The valueless character, "=", is used for trailing padding. 結尾`s`可以包含零個、 一個或兩個填補字元。The end of `s` can consist of zero, one, or two padding characters. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法設計來處理單一字串，包含要解碼的所有資料。The method is designed to process a single string that contains all the data to be decoded. 若要解碼資料流的 base-64 字元資料，使用類別。To decode base-64 character data from a stream, use the class. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法，將位元組陣列轉換 (base-64) uuencode 編碼字串，然後呼叫方法，以還原原始的位元組陣列。The following example uses the method to convert a byte array to a UUencoded (base-64) string, and then calls the method to restore the original byte array. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.ToBase64String#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Convert.ToBase64String/cs/ToBase64String2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.ToBase64String#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Convert.ToBase64String/vb/ToBase64String2.vb#1)] 以下是更複雜的範例會建立 32 位元整數的 20 個元素陣列。The following is a more complex example that creates a 20-element array of 32-bit integers. 然後它會使用方法，將每個項目轉換成位元組陣列，它會將儲存在緩衝區中的適當位置呼叫方法。It then uses the method to convert each element into a byte array, which it stores in the appropriate position in a buffer by calling the method. 這個緩衝區會接著傳遞給方法建立的 (base-64) uuencode 編碼字串。This buffer is then passed to the method to create a UUencoded (base-64) string. 然後它會呼叫方法來解碼 uuencode 編碼字串，並呼叫方法，將每一組的四個位元組 （32 位元整數的大小） 轉換成整數。It then calls the method to decode the UUencoded string, and calls the method to convert each set of four bytes (the size of a 32-bit integer) to an integer. 範例輸出顯示已成功還原原始的陣列。The output from the example shows that the original array has been successfully restored. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.ToBase64String#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Convert.ToBase64String/cs/ToBase64String.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.ToBase64String#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Convert.ToBase64String/vb/ToBase64String.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法測試是否`value`參數等於。The method tests whether the `value` parameter is equal to . 相當於下列程式碼：It is equivalent to the following code: [!code-csharp[System.Convert.IsDBNull#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.IsDBNull/cs/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.IsDBNull#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.IsDBNull/vb/Form1.vb#1)] > [!NOTE] > 用來指出遺漏的值。 is used to indicate a value that is missing. 不等於`null`或。It is not equivalent to `null` or to . 因此，程式碼如`Convert.IsDBNull(null)`在 C# 或`Convert.IsDBNull(Nothing)`Visual Basic 傳回`false`。Therefore, code such as `Convert.IsDBNull(null)` in C# or `Convert.IsDBNull(Nothing)` in Visual Basic returns`false`. ## Examples 下列範例會使用調查資料擷取的資料庫物件。The following example uses a object to retrieve survey data from a database. 它會指派一個陣列，每個資料列的欄位值，然後將每個陣列項目方法。It assigns each row's field values to an array, and then passes each array element to the method. 如果此方法會傳回`true`，此範例會將字串"NA"指派給陣列元素。If the method returns `true`, the example assigns the string "NA" to the array element. 接著會加入至陣列集合控制項。The array is then added to the collection of a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 子集`length`的項目`inArray`位置開始`offsetIn`視為數值和轉換中的項目子集，`outArray`位置開始`offsetOut`。The subset of `length` elements of `inArray` starting at position `offsetIn`, are taken as a numeric value and converted to a subset of elements in `outArray` starting at position `offsetOut`. 傳回值會指出轉換中的元素數目`outArray`。The return value indicates the number of converted elements in `outArray`. 子集`outArray`base 64 數字所組成。The subset of `outArray` consists of base-64 digits. Base 64 數字以遞增順序，從零是否為大寫的字元"A"到"Z"、 小寫字元"a"到"z"、 數字"0"到"9"和符號"+"和"/"。The base-64 digits in ascending order from zero are the uppercase characters "A" to "Z", the lowercase characters "a" to "z", the numerals "0" to "9", and the symbols "+" and "/". 用處的字元，"="做為尾端填補。The valueless character, "=", is used for trailing padding. `offset`和`length`參數是 32 位元帶正負號的數字。The `offset` and `length` parameters are 32-bit signed numbers. `offsetIn`和`offsetOut`參數都是以零為起始的陣列位置。The `offsetIn` and `offsetOut` parameters are zero-based array positions. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法設計來處理單一位元組陣列，其中包含要編碼的所有資料。The method is designed to process a single byte array that contains all the data to be encoded. 若要從位元組資料流建立 base-64 字元陣列，使用類別。To create a base-64 character array from a byte stream, use the class. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用UUencode 方法 （格式為 base 64 編碼） 二進位資料流，然後儲存至檔案的編碼方式。The following example demonstrates using the method to UUencode (encode in base 64) a binary stream, then save the encoding to a file. [!code-cpp[System.Convert UUEncodeDecode functions#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Convert UUEncodeDecode functions/CPP/class1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Convert UUEncodeDecode functions#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Convert UUEncodeDecode functions/CS/class1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Convert UUEncodeDecode functions#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Convert UUEncodeDecode functions/VB/class1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 子集`length`的項目`inArray`參數的位置開始`offsetIn`視為數值和轉換中的項目子集，`outArray`參數的位置開始`offsetOut`。The subset of `length` elements of the `inArray` parameter starting at position `offsetIn`, are taken as a numeric value and converted to a subset of elements in the `outArray` parameter starting at position `offsetOut`. 傳回值會指出轉換中的元素數目`outArray`。The return value indicates the number of converted elements in `outArray`. 子集`outArray`base 64 數字所組成。The subset of `outArray` consists of base-64 digits. Base 64 數字以遞增順序，從零是否為大寫的字元"A"到"Z"、 小寫字元"a"到"z"、 數字"0"到"9"和符號"+"和"/"。The base-64 digits in ascending order from zero are the uppercase characters "A" to "Z", the lowercase characters "a" to "z", the numerals "0" to "9", and the symbols "+" and "/". 用處字元"="用於尾端填補。The valueless character "=" is used for trailing padding. `offset`和`length`參數是 32 位元帶正負號的數字。The `offset` and `length` parameters are 32-bit signed numbers. `offsetIn`和`offsetOut`參數都是以零為起始的陣列位置。The `offsetIn` and `offsetOut` parameters are zero-based array positions. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法設計來處理單一位元組陣列，其中包含要編碼的所有資料。The method is designed to process a single byte array that contains all the data to be encoded. 若要從位元組資料流建立 base-64 字元陣列，使用類別。To create a base-64 character array from a byte stream, use the class. 如果`options`參數設定為和轉換的輸出是超過 76 個字元，就會插入分行符號每 76 個字元。If the `options` parameter is set to and the output of the conversion is longer than 76 characters, a line break is inserted every 76 characters. 分行符號的定義是歸位字元 (U + 000d) 後面接著行換頁字元 (U + 000A)。A line break is defined as a carriage return character (U+000D) followed by a line feed character (U+000A). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 RFC 2045，「 多用途網際網路郵件延伸標準 」，網址[ https://www.rfc-editor.org/ ](https://www.rfc-editor.org/)。For more information, see RFC 2045, "Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions", at [https://www.rfc-editor.org/](https://www.rfc-editor.org/). ## Examples 下列範例會示範方法。The following example demonstrates the method. 輸入會分成三個位元組 （24 位元） 每個群組。The input is divided into groups of three bytes (24 bits) each. 因此，每個群組包含四個每個數字，範圍從十進位的 0 到 63 的 6 位元數字。Consequently, each group consists of four 6-bit numbers where each number ranges from decimal 0 to 63. 在此範例中，有具有一個位元組其餘 85 3 位元組的群組。In this example, there are 85 3-byte groups with one byte remaining. 第一個群組包含 00，01、 02 產生四個十進位的 0、 0、 4 和 2 相等的 6 位元值的十六進位值。The first group consists of the hexadecimal values 00, 01, and 02, which yield four 6-bit values equal to decimal 0, 0, 4, and 2. 這些四個值對應至 base 64 數字"A"、"A"、"E"和"C"開頭的輸出。Those four values correspond to the base-64 digits "A", "A", "E", and "C" at the beginning of the output. 整數數字 3 位元組的群組不存在，如果剩餘的位元組會有效地以零填補來形成完整的群組。If an integral number of 3-byte groups does not exist, the remaining bytes are effectively padded with zeros to form a complete group. 在此範例中，最後一個位元組的值為十六進位 FF。In this example, the value of the last byte is hexadecimal FF. 前 6 個位元等於十進位 63，對應為 base 64 數字"/"結尾的輸出，而接下來的 2 位元填補零，以產生十進位 48，對應至 base 64 數字，"w"。The first 6 bits are equal to decimal 63, which corresponds to the base-64 digit "/" at the end of the output, and the next 2 bits are padded with zeros to yield decimal 48, which corresponds to the base-64 digit, "w". 最後兩個的 6 位元值會填補，並對應至用處填補字元，"="。The last two 6-bit values are padding and correspond to the valueless padding character, "=". [!code-cpp[convert.tobase64chararray#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/convert.tobase64chararray/CPP/tb64ca.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[convert.tobase64chararray#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/convert.tobase64chararray/CS/tb64ca.cs#1)] [!code-vb[convert.tobase64chararray#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/convert.tobase64chararray/VB/tb64ca.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 項目`inArray`以數值形式拍攝且轉換為使用 base-64 位數編碼的字串表示。The elements of `inArray` are taken as a numeric value and converted to a string representation that is encoded with base-64 digits. Base 64 數字以遞增順序，從零是否為大寫的字元"A"到"Z"、 小寫字元"a"到"z"、 數字"0"到"9"和符號"+"和"/"。The base-64 digits in ascending order from zero are the uppercase characters "A" to "Z", the lowercase characters "a" to "z", the numerals "0" to "9", and the symbols "+" and "/". 用處的字元，"="做為尾端填補。The valueless character, "=", is used for trailing padding. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法設計來處理單一位元組陣列，其中包含要編碼的所有資料。The method is designed to process a single byte array that contains all the data to be encoded. 若要編碼的資料流的資料，請使用類別。To encode data from a stream, use the class. 一般情況下，方法不是用來反覆存取使用 uuencode 編碼 (base 64 編碼) 字串。Ordinarily, the method is not used to round-trip a UUEncoded (base-64 encoded) string. 也就是說，如果您藉由呼叫解碼字串方法，然後將傳回的位元組陣列編碼藉由呼叫方法，產生的字串不一定會有相同的原始字串。That is, if you decode a string by calling the method, then encode the returned byte array by calling the method, the resulting string will not necessarily be identical to the original string. 字串會存取，只有原始字串是有效的 base-64 編碼的字串。The string will round-trip only if the original string is a valid base-64 encoded string. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法，將位元組陣列轉換 (base-64) uuencode 編碼字串，然後呼叫方法，以還原原始的位元組陣列。The following example uses the method to convert a byte array to a UUencoded (base-64) string, and then calls the method to restore the original byte array. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.ToBase64String#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Convert.ToBase64String/cs/ToBase64String2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.ToBase64String#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Convert.ToBase64String/vb/ToBase64String2.vb#1)] 以下是更複雜的範例會建立 32 位元整數的 20 個元素陣列。The following is a more complex example that creates a 20-element array of 32-bit integers. 然後它會使用方法，將每個項目轉換成位元組陣列，它會將儲存在緩衝區中的適當位置呼叫方法。It then uses the method to convert each element into a byte array, which it stores in the appropriate position in a buffer by calling the method. 這個緩衝區會接著傳遞給方法建立的 (base-64) uuencode 編碼字串。This buffer is then passed to the method to create a UUencoded (base-64) string. 然後它會呼叫方法來解碼 uuencode 編碼字串，並呼叫方法，將每一組的四個位元組 （32 位元整數的大小） 轉換成整數。It then calls the method to decode the UUencoded string, and calls the method to convert each set of four bytes (the size of a 32-bit integer) to an integer. 範例輸出顯示已成功還原原始的陣列。The output from the example shows that the original array has been successfully restored. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.ToBase64String#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Convert.ToBase64String/cs/ToBase64String.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.ToBase64String#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Convert.ToBase64String/vb/ToBase64String.vb#2)]

summary.span: Converts an array of 8-bit unsigned integers to its equivalent string representation that is encoded with base-64 digits.

span.span: Converts an array of 8-bit unsigned integers to its equivalent string representation that is encoded with base-64 digits.

summary.span: A parameter specifies whether to insert line breaks in the return value.

span.span: A parameter specifies whether to insert line breaks in the return value.

returns.span: The string representation in base 64 of the elements in .

span.span: The string representation in base 64 of the elements in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 項目`inArray`參數會被視為數字的值，轉換為 base 64 的字串表示。The elements of the `inArray` parameter are taken as a numeric value and converted to a string representation in base 64. Base 64 數字以遞增順序，從零是否為大寫的字元"A"到"Z"、 小寫字元"a"到"z"、 數字"0"到"9"和符號"+"和"/"。The base-64 digits in ascending order from zero are the uppercase characters "A" to "Z", the lowercase characters "a" to "z", the numerals "0" to "9", and the symbols "+" and "/". 用處字元"="用於尾端填補。The valueless character "=" is used for trailing padding. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法設計來處理單一位元組陣列，其中包含要編碼的所有資料。The method is designed to process a single byte array that contains all the data to be encoded. 若要編碼的資料流的資料，請使用類別。To encode data from a stream, use the class. 如果`options`參數設定為和轉換的輸出是超過 76 個字元，就會插入分行符號每 76 個字元。If the `options` parameter is set to and the output of the conversion is longer than 76 characters, a line break is inserted every 76 characters. 分行符號的定義是歸位字元 (U + 000d) 後面接著行換頁字元 (U + 000A)。A line break is defined as a carriage return character (U+000D) followed by a line feed character (U+000A). 因為分行符號會被視為空白字元以 base 64 編碼方式，將會忽略轉換 base 64 編碼字串的位元組陣列。Because line breaks are considered whitespace characters in a base-64 encoding, they are ignored when converting a base-64 encoded string back to a byte array. 對控制項或裝置，例如主控台視窗中顯示編碼的字串時，插入換行符號會只是很方便。The line breaks are simply convenient when displaying the encoded string to a control or a device such as a console window. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 RFC 2045，「 多用途網際網路郵件延伸標準 」，網址[ https://www.rfc-editor.org/ ](https://www.rfc-editor.org/)。For more information, see RFC 2045, "Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions", at [https://www.rfc-editor.org/](https://www.rfc-editor.org/). ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫與插入列的引數會中斷已編碼所產生的 100 個元素的位元組陣列的字串。The following example calls the with a argument to insert line breaks in the string that is produced by encoding a 100-element byte array. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.ToBase64String#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Convert.ToBase64String/cs/ToBase64String3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.ToBase64String#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Convert.ToBase64String/vb/ToBase64String3.vb#3)] 做為範例所示，從輸出成功地還原原始的位元組陣列則分行符號字元會在轉換期間忽略。As the output from the example shows, the succeeds in restoring the original byte array; the line break characters are ignored during the conversion.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 項目`inArray`會被視為數字的值，轉換為的字串表示，格式為 base 64。The elements of `inArray` are taken as a numeric value and converted to a string representation in base 64. Base 64 數字以遞增順序，從零是否為大寫的字元"A"到"Z"、 小寫字元"a"到"z"、 數字"0"到"9"和符號"+"和"/"。The base-64 digits in ascending order from zero are the uppercase characters "A" to "Z", the lowercase characters "a" to "z", the numerals "0" to "9", and the symbols "+" and "/". 用處的字元，"="做為尾端填補。The valueless character, "=", is used for trailing padding. `offset`和`length`參數是 32 位元帶正負號的數字。The `offset` and `length` parameters are 32-bit signed numbers. `offset`參數以零為起始。The `offset` parameter is zero-based. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法設計來處理單一位元組陣列，其中包含要編碼的所有資料。The method is designed to process a single byte array that contains all the data to be encoded. 若要編碼的資料流的資料，請使用類別。To encode data from a stream, use the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 項目`inArray`參數會被視為數字的值，轉換為 base 64 的字串表示。The elements of the `inArray` parameter are taken as a numeric value and converted to a string representation in base 64. Base 64 數字以遞增順序，從零是否為大寫的字元"A"到"Z"、 小寫字元"a"到"z"、 數字"0"到"9"和符號"+"和"/"。The base-64 digits in ascending order from zero are the uppercase characters "A" to "Z", the lowercase characters "a" to "z", the numerals "0" to "9", and the symbols "+" and "/". 用處字元"="用於尾端填補。The valueless character "=" is used for trailing padding. `offset`和`length`參數是 32 位元帶正負號的數字。The `offset` and `length` parameters are 32-bit signed numbers. `offset`參數以零為起始。The `offset` parameter is zero-based. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法設計來處理單一位元組陣列，其中包含要編碼的所有資料。The method is designed to process a single byte array that contains all the data to be encoded. 若要編碼的資料流的資料，請使用類別。To encode data from a stream, use the class. 如果`options`參數設定為和轉換的輸出是超過 76 個字元，就會插入分行符號每 76 個字元。If the `options` parameter is set to and the output of the conversion is longer than 76 characters, a line break is inserted every 76 characters. 分行符號的定義是歸位字元 (U + 000d) 後面接著行換頁字元 (U + 000A)。A line break is defined as a carriage return character (U+000D) followed by a line feed character (U+000A). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 RFC 2045，「 多用途網際網路郵件延伸標準 」，網址[ https://www.rfc-editor.org/ ](https://www.rfc-editor.org/)。For more information, see RFC 2045, "Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions", at [https://www.rfc-editor.org/](https://www.rfc-editor.org/). ## Examples 下列範例會示範方法。The following example demonstrates the method. 輸入會分成三個位元組 （24 位元） 每個群組。The input is divided into groups of three bytes (24 bits) each. 因此，每個群組包含四個每個數字，範圍從十進位的 0 到 63 的 6 位元數字。Consequently, each group consists of four 6-bit numbers where each number ranges from decimal 0 to 63. 在此範例中，有具有一個位元組其餘 85 3 位元組的群組。In this example, there are 85 3-byte groups with one byte remaining. 第一個群組包含 00，01、 02 產生四個十進位的 0、 0、 4 和 2 相等的 6 位元值的十六進位值。The first group consists of the hexadecimal values 00, 01, and 02, which yield four 6-bit values equal to decimal 0, 0, 4, and 2. 這些四個值對應至 base 64 數字"A"、"A"、"E"和"C"開頭的輸出。Those four values correspond to the base-64 digits "A", "A", "E", and "C" at the beginning of the output. 整數數字 3 位元組的群組不存在，如果剩餘的位元組會有效地以零填補來形成完整的群組。If an integral number of 3-byte groups does not exist, the remaining bytes are effectively padded with zeros to form a complete group. 在此範例中，最後一個位元組的值為十六進位 FF。In this example, the value of the last byte is hexadecimal FF. 前 6 個位元等於十進位 63，對應為 base 64 數字"/"結尾的輸出，而接下來的 2 位元填補零，以產生十進位 48，對應至 base 64 數字，"w"。The first 6 bits are equal to decimal 63, which corresponds to the base-64 digit "/" at the end of the output, and the next 2 bits are padded with zeros to yield decimal 48, which corresponds to the base-64 digit, "w". 最後兩個的 6 位元值會填補，並對應至用處填補字元，"="。The last two 6-bit values are padding and correspond to the valueless padding character, "=". remarks.format: ## Remarks `provider` 可讓使用者指定的內容的相關特定文化特性的轉換資訊`value`。`provider` enables the user to specify culture-specific conversion information about the contents of `value`. 基底類型忽略`provider`; 不過，如果，可能會使用參數`value`是使用者定義型別可實作介面。The base types ignore `provider`; however, the parameter may be used if `value` is a user-defined type that implements the interface. ## Examples 下列範例定義一個實作 `ByteString` 介面的 類別。The following example defines a `ByteString` class that implements the interface. 類別會儲存符號欄位，以及一個位元組值的字串表示，使其能夠表示這兩個位元組帶正負號和不帶正負號的位元組值。The class stores the string representation of a byte value along with a sign field, so that it is able to represent both signed and unsigned byte values. remarks.format: ## Remarks `provider` 是取得的執行個體物件。`provider` is an instance that obtains a object. 物件提供特定文化特性格式資訊`value`。The object provides culture-specific information about the format of `value`. 如果`provider`是`null`、物件會使用目前文化特性。If `provider` is `null`, the object for the current culture is used. 如果您不想處理的例外狀況，如果轉換失敗，您可以呼叫方法改為。If you prefer not to handle an exception if the conversion fails, you can call the method instead. 它會傳回值，指出轉換成功或失敗。It returns a value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded or failed. ## Examples 下列範例會建立自訂物件，用以定義"協商"，它會使用呼叫中的 「 位置 」 和負號為正號方法。The following example creates a custom object that defines the positive sign as "pos" and the negative sign as "neg", which it uses in calls to the method. 然後它會呼叫方法重複，將轉換的字串陣列中每個項目值。It then calls the method repeatedly to convert each element in a string array to a value. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`fromBase`是 16，您可以使用前置詞指定的數字`value`與 「 0x 」 或 「 0x 」 的參數。If `fromBase` is 16, you can prefix the number specified by the `value` parameter with "0x" or "0X". 因為資料型別支援不帶正負號的值僅方法會假設`value`使用不帶正負號的二進位表示法來表示。Because the data type supports unsigned values only, the method assumes that `value` is expressed using unsigned binary representation. 換句話說，所有的八位元用來表示數字的值，並正負號位元不存在。In other words, all eight bits are used to represent the numeric value, and a sign bit is absent. 如此一來，就可以撰寫程式碼所在的帶正負號的位元組值，超出的範圍資料類型轉換成值而不擲回例外狀況的方法。As a result, it is possible to write code in which a signed byte value that is out of the range of the data type is converted to a value without the method throwing an exception. 下列範例會將轉換其十六進位字串表示法，然後呼叫方法。The following example converts to its hexadecimal string representation, and then calls the method. 而不是擲回例外狀況，此方法會顯示訊息，「"0x80 轉換成 128。Instead of throwing an exception, the method displays the message, "0x80 converts to 128." [!code-csharp[System.Convert.BaseConversion#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/cs/Conversion.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.BaseConversion#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/vb/Conversion.vb#3)] 執行的二進位運算或數值的轉換時一律驗證方法或運算子使用適當的數值表示法來轉譯特定的值，開發人員的責任。When performing binary operations or numeric conversions, it is always the responsibility of the developer to verify that a method or operator is using the appropriate numeric representation to interpret a particular value. 下列範例說明的技巧，確保，該方法不適當地使用不帶正負號的二進位表示將轉換的十六進位字串表示的值。The following example illustrates one technique for ensuring that the method does not inappropriately use unsigned binary representation when it converts a hexadecimal string representation to a value. 此範例會判斷值，代表帶正負號或不帶正負號的整數，而它會將該值轉換為其字串表示。The example determines whether a value represents a signed or an unsigned integer while it is converting that value to its string representation. 值在此範例會將轉換已返回值，它會檢查原始的值是否為帶正負號的整數。When the example converts the value back to a value, it checks whether the original value was a signed integer. 因此，和其高序位位元會設 （這表示的值為負數且它會使用兩個互補而不是不帶正負號的二進位表示法），在方法擲回例外狀況。If so, and if its high-order bit is set (which indicates that the value is negative and that it uses two's complement instead of unsigned binary representation), the method throws an exception. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.BaseConversion#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/cs/Conversion.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.BaseConversion#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/vb/Conversion.vb#4)] ## Examples 下列範例或者嘗試將字串陣列，則會解譯為二進位、 八進位、 十進位和十六進位值的表示法。The following example alternately attempts to interpret an array of strings as the representation of binary, octal, decimal, and hexadecimal values. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.ToByte#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.tobyte/cs/tobyte2.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.ToByte#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.tobyte/vb/tobyte2.vb#11)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`value`不`null`，則傳回值是叫用的結果方法`value`使用中的格式設定資訊初始化目前的文化特性的物件。If `value` is not `null`, the return value is the result of invoking the method on `value` using the formatting information in a object that is initialized for the current culture. `value`引數必須包含日期表示法，而且其中一種格式的時間述主題。The `value` argument must contain the representation of a date and time in one of the formats described in the topic. 如果 `value` 是 `null`，則方法會傳回 。If `value` is `null`, the method returns . 這個方法會嘗試剖析`value`完全並避免擲回。This method tries to parse `value` completely and avoid throwing a . 完成遺漏月、 日和年資訊以目前的日期。It completes missing month, day, and year information with the current date. 如果`value`包含的日期和沒有時間中，這個方法會假設午夜的時間。If `value` contains only a date and no time, this method assumes a time of midnight. 前置、 內部或尾端空格字元`value`都會被忽略。Any leading, inner, or trailing white-space characters in `value` are ignored. 如果您不想處理的例外狀況，如果轉換失敗，您可以呼叫方法改為。If you prefer not to handle an exception if the conversion fails, you can call the method instead. 它會傳回值，指出轉換成功或失敗。It returns a value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded or failed. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法，將轉換的日期和時間的各種字串表示法值。The following example uses the method to convert various string representations of dates and times to values. remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回值是叫用的結果方法的基礎類型`value`。The return value is the result of invoking the method of the underlying type of `value`. `provider` 可讓使用者指定的內容的相關特定文化特性的轉換資訊`value`。`provider` enables the user to specify culture-specific conversion information about the contents of `value`. 例如，如果`value`是表示數字，`provider`可能會提供用來代表該數字的標記法的特定文化特性資訊。For example, if `value` is a that represents a number, `provider` could supply culture-specific information about the notation used to represent that number. 基底類型忽略`provider`; 不過，如果，可能會使用參數`value`是使用者定義型別可實作介面。The base types ignore `provider`; however, the parameter may be used if `value` is a user-defined type that implements the interface. ## Examples 下列範例會定義一個類別，實作和類別可實作。The following example defines a class that implements and a class that implements . 實作類別的物件保存陣列值。Objects of the class that implements hold an array of values. 每個類別的物件傳遞至`ToDouble`方法。An object of each class is passed to the `ToDouble` method. 這個方法會傳回一維陣列的平均，使用值實作的物件來判斷如何計算平均。This method returns an average of the array of values, using the object that implements to determine how to calculate the average. remarks.format: ## Remarks `provider` 可讓使用者指定的內容的相關特定文化特性的轉換資訊`value`。`provider` enables the user to specify culture-specific conversion information about the contents of `value`. 例如，如果`value`是表示數字，`provider`可能會提供用來代表該數字的標記法的特定文化特性資訊。For example, if `value` is a that represents a number, `provider` could supply culture-specific information about the notation used to represent that number. 基底類型忽略`provider`; 不過，如果，可能會使用參數`value`是使用者定義型別可實作介面。The base types ignore `provider`; however, the parameter may be used if `value` is a user-defined type that implements the interface. ## Examples 下列範例會定義一個類別，實作和類別可實作。The following example defines a class that implements and a class that implements . 實作類別的物件保存陣列值。Objects of the class that implements hold an array of values. 每個類別的物件傳遞至`ToInt16`方法。An object of each class is passed to the `ToInt16` method. 這個方法會傳回一維陣列的平均，使用值實作的物件來判斷如何計算平均。This method returns an average of the array of values, using the object that implements to determine how to calculate the average. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`fromBase`是 16，您可以使用前置詞指定的數字`value`與 「 0x 」 或 「 0x 」 的參數。If `fromBase` is 16, you can prefix the number specified by the `value` parameter with "0x" or "0X". 因為非基底 10 數值表示，不支援負號方法會假設負數使用二的補數表示法。Because the negative sign is not supported for non-base 10 numeric representations, the method assumes that negative numbers use two’s complement representation. 換句話說，此方法一定會將最高順序二進位位元的整數 （位元 15） 解譯其正負號位元。In other words, the method always interprets the highest-order binary bit of an integer (bit 15) as its sign bit. 如此一來，就可以撰寫程式碼中非基底 10 編號超出範圍的資料類型轉換成值而不擲回例外狀況的方法。As a result, it is possible to write code in which a non-base 10 number that is out of the range of the data type is converted to an value without the method throwing an exception. 下列範例為增量單位，轉換為十六進位字串表示，產生的數字，然後呼叫方法。The following example increments by one, converts the resulting number to its hexadecimal string representation, and then calls the method. 而不是擲回例外狀況，此方法會顯示訊息，「"0x8000 轉換成-32768。Instead of throwing an exception, the method displays the message, "0x8000 converts to -32768." [!code-csharp[System.Convert.BaseConversion#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/cs/Conversion.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.BaseConversion#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/vb/Conversion.vb#5)] 執行的二進位運算或數值的轉換時一律確認的方法使用適當的數值表示法，來轉譯特定的值，開發人員的責任。When performing binary operations or numeric conversions, it is always the responsibility of the developer to verify that a method is using the appropriate numeric representation to interpret a particular value. 如下列範例所示，您可以確保，方法會處理溢位適當地藉由第一個擷取的數值正負號之前將它轉換成其十六進位字串表示。As the following example illustrates, you can ensure that the method handles overflows appropriately by first retrieving the sign of the numeric value before converting it to its hexadecimal string representation. 如果原始值為正數，但是在轉換回整數會產生負數值，會擲回例外狀況。Throw an exception if the original value was positive but the conversion back to an integer yields a negative value. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.BaseConversion#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/cs/Conversion.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.BaseConversion#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/vb/Conversion.vb#6)] ## Examples 下列範例會嘗試解譯為十六進位字串的字串陣列中每個項目，並將它轉換成 16 位元帶正負號的整數。The following example attempts to interpret each element in a string array as a hexadecimal string and to convert it to a 16-bit signed integer. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`fromBase`是 16，您可以使用前置詞指定的數字`value`與 「 0x 」 或 「 0x 」 的參數。If `fromBase` is 16, you can prefix the number specified by the `value` parameter with "0x" or "0X". 因為非基底 10 數值表示，不支援負號方法會假設負數使用二的補數表示法。Because the negative sign is not supported for non-base 10 numeric representations, the method assumes that negative numbers use two’s complement representation. 換句話說，此方法一定會將整數 （位元 31） 的最高順序二進位位元解譯其正負號位元。In other words, the method always interprets the highest-order binary bit of an integer (bit 31) as its sign bit. 如此一來，就可以撰寫程式碼中非基底 10 編號超出範圍的資料類型轉換成值而不擲回例外狀況的方法。As a result, it is possible to write code in which a non-base 10 number that is out of the range of the data type is converted to an value without the method throwing an exception. 下列範例為增量單位，轉換為十六進位字串表示，產生的數字，然後呼叫方法。The following example increments by one, converts the resulting number to its hexadecimal string representation, and then calls the method. 而不是擲回例外狀況，此方法會顯示訊息，「"0x80000000 轉換成-2147483648。Instead of throwing an exception, the method displays the message, "0x80000000 converts to -2147483648." [!code-cpp[System.Convert.BaseConversion#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/cpp/toint_str_int32.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Convert.BaseConversion#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/cs/Conversion.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.BaseConversion#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/vb/Conversion.vb#1)] 執行的二進位運算或數值的轉換時一律確認的方法使用適當的數值表示法，來轉譯特定的值，開發人員的責任。When performing binary operations or numeric conversions, it is always the responsibility of the developer to verify that a method is using the appropriate numeric representation to interpret a particular value. 如下列範例所示，您可以確保，方法會處理溢位適當地藉由第一個擷取的數值正負號之前將它轉換成其十六進位字串表示。As the following example illustrates, you can ensure that the method handles overflows appropriately by first retrieving the sign of the numeric value before converting it to its hexadecimal string representation. 如果原始值為正數，但是在轉換回整數會產生負數值，會擲回例外狀況。Throw an exception if the original value was positive but the conversion back to an integer yields a negative value. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`fromBase`是 16，您可以使用前置詞指定的數字`value`與 「 0x 」 或 「 0x 」 的參數。If `fromBase` is 16, you can prefix the number specified by the `value` parameter with "0x" or "0X". 因為非基底 10 數值表示，不支援負號方法會假設負數使用二的補數表示法。Because the negative sign is not supported for non-base 10 numeric representations, the method assumes that negative numbers use two’s complement representation. 換句話說，此方法一定會將長整數 （位元 63） 的最高順序二進位位元解譯其正負號位元。In other words, the method always interprets the highest-order binary bit of a long integer (bit 63) as its sign bit. 如此一來，就可以撰寫程式碼中非基底 10 編號超出範圍的資料類型轉換成值而不擲回例外狀況的方法。As a result, it is possible to write code in which a non-base 10 number that is out of the range of the data type is converted to an value without the method throwing an exception. 下列範例會將轉換其十六進位字串表示法，然後呼叫方法。The following example converts to its hexadecimal string representation, and then calls the method. 而不是擲回例外狀況，此方法會顯示訊息，「"0xFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF 轉換為-1。Instead of throwing an exception, the method displays the message, "0xFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF converts to -1." [!code-csharp[System.Convert.BaseConversion#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/cs/Conversion.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.BaseConversion#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/vb/Conversion.vb#7)] 執行的二進位運算或數值的轉換時一律確認的方法使用適當的數值表示法，來轉譯特定的值，開發人員的責任。When performing binary operations or numeric conversions, it is always the responsibility of the developer to verify that a method is using the appropriate numeric representation to interpret a particular value. 如下列範例所示，您可以確保，方法會處理溢位適當是先判斷值是否代表不帶正負號或帶正負號的類型時將它轉換成其十六進位字串表示。As the following example illustrates, you can ensure that the method handles overflows appropriately by first determining whether a value represents an unsigned or a signed type when converting it to its hexadecimal string representation. 如果原始值為不帶正負號的類型，但是在轉換回整數的結果的值的正負號位元為開啟，會擲回例外狀況。Throw an exception if the original value was an unsigned type but the conversion back to an integer yields a value whose sign bit is on. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.BaseConversion#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/cs/Conversion.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.BaseConversion#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/vb/Conversion.vb#8)] 下列範例會嘗試解譯為十六進位字串的字串陣列中每個項目，並將它轉換為長整數。The following example attempts to interpret each element in a string array as a hexadecimal string and convert it to a long integer. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.ToInt64#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.toint64/cs/toint64_2.cs#15)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.ToInt64#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.toint64/vb/toint64_2.vb#15)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `provider` 可讓使用者指定的內容的相關特定文化特性的轉換資訊`value`。`provider` enables the user to specify culture-specific conversion information about the contents of `value`. 例如，如果`value`是表示數字，`provider`可能會提供用來代表該數字的標記法的特定文化特性資訊。For example, if `value` is a that represents a number, `provider` could supply culture-specific information about the notation used to represent that number. 基底類型忽略`provider`; 不過，如果，可能會使用參數`value`是使用者定義型別可實作介面。The base types ignore `provider`; however, the parameter may be used if `value` is a user-defined type that implements the interface. ## Examples 下列範例會定義`ByteString`類別，以儲存兩者帶正負號和不帶正負號為沿著與欄位，指出位元組的正負號的十六進位字串的位元組。The following example defines a `ByteString` class that stores both signed and unsigned bytes as hexadecimal strings along with a field that indicates the sign of the byte. `ByteString` 類別會實作 介面。The `ByteString` class implements the interface. 其方法呼叫方法，以執行轉換。Its method calls the method to perform the conversion. 如果失敗，就會擲回。If it fails, it throws an . remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`fromBase`是 16，您可以使用前置詞指定的數字`value`與 「 0x 」 或 「 0x 」 的參數。If `fromBase` is 16, you can prefix the number specified by the `value` parameter with "0x" or "0X". 因為非基底 10 數值表示，不支援負號方法會假設負數使用二的補數表示法。Because the negative sign is not supported for non-base 10 numeric representations, the method assumes that negative numbers use two’s complement representation. 換句話說，此方法一定會將一個位元組 （7 位元） 的高序位位元解譯其正負號位元。In other words, the method always interprets the high-order bit of a byte (bit 7) as its sign bit. 如此一來，就可以撰寫程式碼中非基底 10 編號超出範圍的資料類型轉換成值而不擲回例外狀況的方法。As a result, it is possible to write code in which a non-base 10 number that is out of the range of the data type is converted to an value without the method throwing an exception. 下列範例會將轉換其十六進位字串表示法，然後呼叫方法。The following example converts to its hexadecimal string representation, and then calls the method. 而不是擲回例外狀況，此方法會顯示訊息，「"0xff 轉換為-1。Instead of throwing an exception, the method displays the message, "0xff converts to -1." [!code-csharp[System.Convert.BaseConversion#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/cs/Conversion.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.BaseConversion#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/vb/Conversion.vb#9)] 執行的二進位運算或數值的轉換時一律確認的方法使用適當的數值表示法，來轉譯特定的值，開發人員的責任。When performing binary operations or numeric conversions, it is always the responsibility of the developer to verify that a method is using the appropriate numeric representation to interpret a particular value. 如下列範例所示，您可以確保，方法會處理溢位適當是先判斷值是否代表不帶正負號或帶正負號的類型時將它轉換成其十六進位字串表示。As the following example illustrates, you can ensure that the method handles overflows appropriately by first determining whether a value represents an unsigned or a signed type when converting it to its hexadecimal string representation. 如果原始值為不帶正負號的類型，但在轉換回帶正負號的位元組會產生其正負號位元的值，會擲回例外狀況。Throw an exception if the original value was an unsigned type but the conversion back to a signed byte yields a value whose sign bit is on. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.BaseConversion#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/cs/Conversion.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.BaseConversion#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/vb/Conversion.vb#10)] ## Examples 下列範例會嘗試解譯為二進位，八進位，將字串陣列中的項目和數字值的十六進位表示法，以便將它們轉換成不帶正負號的位元組。The following example attempts to interpret the elements in a string array as the binary, octal, and hexadecimal representation of numeric values in order to convert them to unsigned bytes. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.ToSByte#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.tosbyte/cs/tosbyte3.cs#16)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.ToSByte#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.tosbyte/vb/tosbyte3.vb#16)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`value`為正數及`toBase`為 2、 8 或 16，則傳回的字串會使用正負號和大小表示。If `value` is positive and `toBase` is 2, 8, or 16, the returned string uses sign-and-magnitude representation. 如果`value`是負數，`toBase`為 2、 8 或 16，則傳回的字串會使用二的補數表示法。If `value` is negative and `toBase` is 2, 8, or 16, the returned string uses two's complement representation. 這表示高序位位元的高序位位元 （位元 15） 會解譯為正負號位元。This means that the high-order bit of the high-order byte (bit 15) is interpreted as the sign bit. 如果呼叫方法來建立稍後將會轉換回數字的字串，會假設類似的數值表示法的對應方法應該呼叫來執行轉換。If the method is called to create a string that will later be converted back to a number, a corresponding method that assumes a similar numeric representation should be called to perform the conversion. 這類方法包括和。Such methods include and . ## Examples 下列範例會將 16 位元帶正負號的整數陣列中每個項目轉換成其對等二進位、 八進位、 十進位和十六進位字串表示。The following example converts each element in an array of 16-bit signed integers to its equivalent binary, octal, decimal, and hexadecimal string representations. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`value`為正數及`toBase`為 2、 8 或 16，則傳回的字串會使用正負號和大小表示。If `value` is positive and `toBase` is 2, 8, or 16, the returned string uses sign-and-magnitude representation. 如果`value`是負數，`toBase`為 2、 8 或 16，則傳回的字串會使用二的補數表示法。If `value` is negative and `toBase` is 2, 8, or 16, the returned string uses two's complement representation. 這表示最高序位位元組 （位元 31） 的高序位位元會解譯為正負號位元。This means that the high-order bit of the highest-order byte (bit 31) is interpreted as the sign bit. 如果呼叫方法來建立稍後將會轉換回數字的字串，會假設類似的數值表示法的對應方法應該呼叫來執行轉換。If the method is called to create a string that will later be converted back to a number, a corresponding method that assumes a similar numeric representation should be called to perform the conversion. 這類方法包括和。Such methods include and . ## Examples 下列範例會將整數陣列中的每個項目轉換成其對等二進位、 十六進位、 十進位和十六進位字串表示。The following example converts each element in an integer array to its equivalent binary, hexadecimal, decimal, and hexadecimal string representations. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`value`參數實作介面，這個方法會呼叫實作`value`。If the `value` parameter implements the interface, the method calls the implementation of `value`. 否則，如果`value`參數實作介面，這個方法會呼叫其實作。Otherwise, if the `value` parameter implements the interface, the method calls its implementation. 如果`value`實作都沒有介面，這個方法會呼叫`value`參數的`ToString()`方法，而`provider`參數已忽略。If `value` implements neither interface, the method calls the `value` parameter's `ToString()` method, and the `provider` parameter is ignored. `provider`參數用如果`value`參數實作或介面。The `provider` parameter is used if the `value` parameter implements the or interface. 最常見的用法`provider`參數是指定的轉換使用的特定文化特性資訊`value`。The most common use of the `provider` parameter is to specify culture-specific information used in the conversion of `value`. 例如，如果`value`參數是負的十進位數字，`provider`參數可以提供用於負號和小數點標記法的特定文化特性資訊。For example, if the `value` parameter is a negative decimal number, the `provider` parameter can supply culture-specific information about the notation used for the negative sign and decimal separator. 第二個範例下, 一節中的說明的格式提供者，並不提供區分文化特性格式資訊。The second example in the next section illustrates a format provider that does not supply culture-sensitive formatting information. ## Examples 下列範例會定義`Temperature`類別會覆寫方法但未實作介面。The following example defines a `Temperature` class that overrides the method but does not implement the interface. 本範例會示範如何呼叫方法，再呼叫`Temperature.ToString`方法。The example illustrates how calls to the method, in turn, call the `Temperature.ToString` method. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.ToString2#26](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.tostring2/cs/tostring5.cs#26)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.ToString2#26](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.tostring2/vb/tostring5.vb#26)] 下列範例會定義`Temperature`類別可實作介面，但未實作介面。The following example defines a `Temperature` class that implements the interface but does not implement the interface. 其實作代表`Temperature`攝氏、 華氏，或這個類別，根據格式字串的值。Its implementation represents the `Temperature` value in Celsius, Fahrenheit, or Kelvin, depending on the format string. 此範例也會定義`TemperatureProvider`實作類別，並提供隨機產生的格式字串，由實作`Temperature`類別。The example also defines a `TemperatureProvider` class that implements and provides a randomly generated format string that is used by the implementation of the `Temperature` class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回值是叫用的結果方法的基礎類型`value`。The return value is the result of invoking the method of the underlying type of `value`. `provider` 可讓使用者指定的內容的相關特定文化特性的轉換資訊`value`。`provider` enables the user to specify culture-specific conversion information about the contents of `value`. 例如，如果`value`是表示數字，`provider`可能會提供用來代表該數字的標記法的特定文化特性資訊。For example, if `value` is a that represents a number, `provider` could supply culture-specific information about the notation used to represent that number. 基底類型忽略`provider`; 不過，如果，可能會使用參數`value`是使用者定義型別可實作介面。The base types ignore `provider`; however, the parameter may be used if `value` is a user-defined type that implements the interface. ## Examples 下列範例會定義`HexString`類別可實作介面，為了容納這兩個 16 位元帶正負號和 16 位元不帶正負號值的字串表示。The following example defines a `HexString` class that implements the interface and that is designed to hold the string representation of both 16-bit signed and 16-bit unsigned values. 類別包含`Sign`表示正負號的十六進位值的屬性。The class includes a `Sign` property that indicates the sign of its hexadecimal value. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`fromBase`是 16，您可以使用前置詞指定的數字`value`與 「 0x 」 或 「 0x 」 的參數。If `fromBase` is 16, you can prefix the number specified by the `value` parameter with "0x" or "0X". 因為資料型別支援不帶正負號的值僅方法會假設`value`使用不帶正負號的二進位表示法來表示。Because the data type supports unsigned values only, the method assumes that `value` is expressed using unsigned binary representation. 換句話說，所有的 16 位元用來表示數字的值，並正負號位元不存在。In other words, all 16 bits are used to represent the numeric value, and a sign bit is absent. 如此一來，就可以撰寫程式碼所在的帶正負號的整數值，超出的範圍資料類型轉換成值而不擲回例外狀況的方法。As a result, it is possible to write code in which a signed integer value that is out of the range of the data type is converted to a value without the method throwing an exception. 下列範例會將轉換其十六進位字串表示法，然後呼叫方法。The following example converts to its hexadecimal string representation, and then calls the method. 而不是擲回例外狀況，此方法會顯示訊息，「"0x8000 轉換成 32768。Instead of throwing an exception, the method displays the message, "0x8000 converts to 32768." [!code-csharp[System.Convert.BaseConversion#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/cs/Conversion.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.BaseConversion#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/vb/Conversion.vb#11)] 執行的二進位運算或數值的轉換時一律驗證方法或運算子使用適當的數值表示法來轉譯特定的值，開發人員的責任。When performing binary operations or numeric conversions, it is always the responsibility of the developer to verify that a method or operator is using the appropriate numeric representation to interpret a particular value. 下列範例說明的技巧，確保方法不會不當地使用二進位表示法來轉譯值時，所用二的補數表示十六進位字串轉換成值。The following example illustrates one technique for ensuring that the method does not inappropriately use binary representation to interpret a value that uses two's complement representation when converting a hexadecimal string to a value. 此範例會判斷值，代表帶正負號或不帶正負號的整數，而它會將該值轉換為其字串表示。The example determines whether a value represents a signed or an unsigned integer while it is converting that value to its string representation. 當此範例將值轉換成值，它會檢查原始的值是否為帶正負號的整數。When the example converts the value to a value, it checks whether the original value was a signed integer. 若是如此，並設定其高序位位元 （表示原始值為負），方法會擲回例外狀況。If so, and if its high-order bit is set (which indicates that the original value was negative), the method throws an exception. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.BaseConversion#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/cs/Conversion.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.BaseConversion#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/vb/Conversion.vb#12)] ## Examples 下列範例會嘗試解譯為十六進位值的數字的字串陣列中每個項目，並將它轉換成不帶正負號的 16 位元整數。The following example attempts to interpret each element in an array of numeric strings as a hexadecimal value and to convert it to an unsigned 16-bit integer. remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回值是叫用的結果方法的基礎類型`value`。The return value is the result of invoking the method of the underlying type of `value`. `provider` 可讓使用者指定的內容的相關特定文化特性的轉換資訊`value`。`provider` enables the user to specify culture-specific conversion information about the contents of `value`. 例如，如果`value`是表示數字，`provider`可能會提供用來代表該數字的標記法的特定文化特性資訊。For example, if `value` is a that represents a number, `provider` could supply culture-specific information about the notation used to represent that number. 基底類型忽略`provider`; 不過，如果，可能會使用參數`value`是使用者定義型別可實作介面。The base types ignore `provider`; however, the parameter may be used if `value` is a user-defined type that implements the interface. ## Examples 下列範例會定義`HexString`類別可實作介面，為了容納這兩個 32 位元帶正負號和 32 位元不帶正負號值的字串表示。The following example defines a `HexString` class that implements the interface and that is designed to hold the string representation of both 32-bit signed and 32-bit unsigned values. 類別包含`Sign`表示正負號的十六進位值的屬性。The class includes a `Sign` property that indicates the sign of its hexadecimal value. remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回值是叫用的結果上`value`。The return value is the result of invoking on `value`. `provider` 是取得的執行個體物件。`provider` is an instance that obtains a object. 物件提供特定文化特性格式資訊`value`。The object provides culture-specific information about the format of `value`. 如果`provider`是`null`、會使用目前文化特性。If `provider` is `null`, the for the current culture is used. 如果您不想處理的例外狀況，如果轉換失敗，您可以呼叫方法改為。If you prefer not to handle an exception if the conversion fails, you can call the method instead. 它會傳回值，指出轉換成功或失敗。It returns a value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded or failed. ## Examples 下列範例會定義自訂物件，會將字串"pos"辨識為正號和字串"協商"做為負號。The following example defines a custom object that recognizes the string "pos" as the positive sign and the string "neg" as the negative sign. 即會嘗試將數字的字串陣列的每個項目轉換成整數使用此提供者和文化特性而異的提供者。It then attempts to convert each element of a numeric string array to an integer using both this provider and the provider for the invariant culture. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`fromBase`是 16，您可以使用前置詞指定的數字`value`與 「 0x 」 或 「 0x 」 的參數。If `fromBase` is 16, you can prefix the number specified by the `value` parameter with "0x" or "0X". 因為資料型別支援不帶正負號的值僅方法會假設`value`使用不帶正負號的二進位表示法來表示。Because the data type supports unsigned values only, the method assumes that `value` is expressed using unsigned binary representation. 換句話說，所有 32 位元用來表示數字的值，並正負號位元不存在。In other words, all 32 bits are used to represent the numeric value, and a sign bit is absent. 如此一來，就可以撰寫程式碼所在的帶正負號的整數值，超出的範圍資料類型轉換成值而不擲回例外狀況的方法。As a result, it is possible to write code in which a signed integer value that is out of the range of the data type is converted to a value without the method throwing an exception. 下列範例會將轉換其十六進位字串表示法，然後呼叫方法。The following example converts to its hexadecimal string representation, and then calls the method. 而不是擲回例外狀況，此方法會顯示訊息，「"0x80000000 轉換成 2147483648。Instead of throwing an exception, the method displays the message, "0x80000000 converts to 2147483648." [!code-csharp[System.Convert.BaseConversion#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/cs/Conversion.cs#13)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.BaseConversion#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/vb/Conversion.vb#13)] 執行的二進位運算或數值的轉換時一律驗證方法或運算子使用適當的數值表示法來轉譯特定的值，開發人員的責任。When performing binary operations or numeric conversions, it is always the responsibility of the developer to verify that a method or operator is using the appropriate numeric representation to interpret a particular value. 下列範例說明的技巧，確保方法不會不當地使用二進位表示法來轉譯值時，所用二的補數表示十六進位字串轉換成值。The following example illustrates one technique for ensuring that the method does not inappropriately use binary representation to interpret a value that uses two's complement representation when converting a hexadecimal string to a value. 此範例會判斷值，代表帶正負號或不帶正負號的整數，而它會將該值轉換為其字串表示。The example determines whether a value represents a signed or an unsigned integer while it is converting that value to its string representation. 當此範例將值轉換成值，它會檢查原始的值是否為帶正負號的整數。When the example converts the value to a value, it checks whether the original value was a signed integer. 若是如此，並設定其高序位位元 （表示原始值為負），方法會擲回例外狀況。If so, and if its high-order bit is set (which indicates that the original value was negative), the method throws an exception. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.BaseConversion#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/cs/Conversion.cs#14)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.BaseConversion#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/vb/Conversion.vb#14)] ## Examples 下列範例會嘗試解譯為十六進位值的數字的字串陣列中每個項目，並將它轉換成不帶正負號的整數。The following example attempts to interpret each element in an array of numeric strings as a hexadecimal value and to convert it to an unsigned integer. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.ToUInt32#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.touint32/cs/touint32_3.cs#16)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.ToUInt32#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.touint32/vb/touint32_3.vb#16)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回值是叫用的結果方法的基礎類型`value`。The return value is the result of invoking the method of the underlying type of `value`. `provider` 可讓使用者指定的內容的相關特定文化特性的轉換資訊`value`。`provider` enables the user to specify culture-specific conversion information about the contents of `value`. 例如，如果`value`是表示數字，`provider`可能會提供用來代表該數字的標記法的特定文化特性資訊。For example, if `value` is a that represents a number, `provider` could supply culture-specific information about the notation used to represent that number. 基底類型忽略`provider`; 不過，如果，可能會使用參數`value`是使用者定義型別可實作介面。The base types ignore `provider`; however, the parameter may be used if `value` is a user-defined type that implements the interface. ## Examples 下列範例會定義`HexString`類別可實作介面，為了容納這兩個 64 位元帶正負號和 64 位元不帶正負號值的字串表示。The following example defines a `HexString` class that implements the interface and that is designed to hold the string representation of both 64-bit signed and 64-bit unsigned values. 類別包含`Sign`表示正負號的十六進位值的屬性。The class includes a `Sign` property that indicates the sign of its hexadecimal value. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`fromBase`是 16，您可以使用前置詞指定的數字`value`與 「 0x 」 或 「 0x 」 的參數。If `fromBase` is 16, you can prefix the number specified by the `value` parameter with "0x" or "0X". 因為資料型別支援不帶正負號的值僅方法會假設`value`使用不帶正負號的二進位表示法來表示。Because the data type supports unsigned values only, the method assumes that `value` is expressed using unsigned binary representation. 換句話說，所有的 64 位元用來表示數字的值，並正負號位元不存在。In other words, all 64 bits are used to represent the numeric value, and a sign bit is absent. 如此一來，就可以撰寫程式碼所在的帶正負號的長整數值，超出的範圍資料類型轉換成值而不擲回例外狀況的方法。As a result, it is possible to write code in which a signed long integer value that is out of the range of the data type is converted to a value without the method throwing an exception. 下列範例會將轉換其十六進位字串表示法，然後呼叫方法。The following example converts to its hexadecimal string representation, and then calls the method. 而不是擲回例外狀況，此方法會顯示訊息，「"0x8000000000000000 轉換成 9223372036854775808。Instead of throwing an exception, the method displays the message, "0x8000000000000000 converts to 9223372036854775808." [!code-csharp[System.Convert.BaseConversion#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/cs/Conversion.cs#15)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.BaseConversion#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/vb/Conversion.vb#15)] 執行的二進位運算或數值的轉換時一律驗證方法或運算子使用適當的數值表示法來轉譯特定的值，開發人員的責任。When performing binary operations or numeric conversions, it is always the responsibility of the developer to verify that a method or operator is using the appropriate numeric representation to interpret a particular value. 下列範例說明的技巧，確保方法不會不當地使用二進位表示法來轉譯值時，所用二的補數表示十六進位字串轉換成值。The following example illustrates one technique for ensuring that the method does not inappropriately use binary representation to interpret a value that uses two's complement representation when converting a hexadecimal string to a value. 此範例會判斷值，代表帶正負號或不帶正負號的整數，而它會將該值轉換為其字串表示。The example determines whether a value represents a signed or an unsigned integer while it is converting that value to its string representation. 當此範例將值轉換成值，它會檢查原始的值是否為帶正負號的整數。When the example converts the value to a value, it checks whether the original value was a signed integer. 若是如此，並設定其高序位位元 （表示原始值為負），方法會擲回例外狀況。If so, and if its high-order bit is set (which indicates that the original value was negative), the method throws an exception. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.BaseConversion#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/cs/Conversion.cs#16)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.BaseConversion#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/vb/Conversion.vb#16)] ## Examples 下列範例會嘗試解譯為十六進位值的數字的字串陣列中每個項目，並將它轉換成不帶正負號的長整數。The following example attempts to interpret each element in an array of numeric strings as a hexadecimal value and to convert it to an unsigned long integer. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.ToUInt64#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.touint64/cs/touint64_3.cs#16)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.ToUInt64#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.touint64/vb/touint64_3.vb#16)]
